title: Nina Turner on Campaigning for Bernie, MLK, and Why Class Matters, Plus a Discussion on Iran
description:
Former Ohio State Senator Nina Turner talks campaigning with Bernie, and getting her start in politics. Matt and Katie discuss Iran/Soleimani, and a strange Florida story involving turkey vultures.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
